item.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on all cars 'not made in the United States'
item.description: Trump had hinted that the auto tariffs could arrive prior to April 2, the day his sweeping "reciprocal tariff" plan is set to begin.

item.title: EU says 'unconditional withdrawal' of Russia from Ukraine is a precondition to amend sanctions

item.title: Europe wants to pour billions of dollars into its own defense companies — but market watchers say it may not be able to shut American firms out
item.description: As Europe looks to hike defense spending, CNBC spoke to industry experts about how the money could be spent — and where it leaves U.S. firms.
